title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not refreshed and the original image is still displayed.
OB: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not refreshed and the original image is still displayed.
EB: The image should be refreshed and the newly imported image should be displayed.
SR: 1. Import a new image (e.g., 'image1.jpg') into the layout. 2. Check if the newly imported image is displayed. If the original image is still displayed, then the bug is reproduced.
